name: Span
slogan: We deliver medical care remotely to reverse metabolic diseases

team.name: Adam Bataineh
team.bioHtml: Medical doctor, Genomic medicine MSc, Interested in healthcare startups, longevity, aging-related diseases, genomics

team.title: CEO
team.name: Patrick Samy
team.bioHtml: Co-founder @Span • @Techstars • @Microsoft • @Stanford University

team.name: Rachel Lett
team.bioHtml: Health  Nutrition Blogger  Freelance Nutrition Advisor, Ank. Experience with Chef, Logistics, Management. Went to University of Leeds, Ballymaloe Cookery School

jobs.title: Medical Doctor
jobs.description:
You're a medical doctor and you always try to have a long-term approach for your patients?

The Span team is looking for a medical doctor to deliver consultations on a mobile application for reversal of hyperinsulinemia in patients with metabolic syndrome.

We are on a mission to deliver uplifting health experiences through technology for millions of individuals to live better, longer.

jobs.title: Dietitian
jobs.description:
You're a medical doctor and you always try to have a long-term approach for your patients?

The Span team is looking for a dietitian to deliver consultations on a mobile application for reversal of hyperinsulinemia in patients with metabolic syndrome, including type 2 diabetes, prediabetes, and polycystic ovary syndrome.


We are on a mission to deliver uplifting health experiences through technology for millions of individuals to live better, longer.

jobs.title: Head of Sales & Partnerships
jobs.description:
The Span team is looking for a hustler who can work with the constraints of a startup on developing commercial partnerships, sales, and distribution.

We are on a mission to deliver uplifting health experiences through technology for millions of individuals to live better, longer.
